article:
The following tables outline the '[[utilization]] of [[biogas]] in the
[[European Union]]' as of 2006. This table is likely to change due to the
increasing interest in biogas use as a renewable fuel and the tax
penalties being imposed on energy or utility companies that waste biogas
by burning it off.

! 5/2007
